chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerms L n (subAllTerms n ts m) v s = subAllTerms n ts (fun n0 : nat => substituteTerm L (m n0) v s)

Premises:
Notation Terms := (fol.Terms L)
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr
subAllTerms : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n
substituteTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n
substituteTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Term L
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
subSubAllTerm : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (subAllTerm t m) v s = subAllTerm t (fun n : nat => substituteTerm L (m n) v s)
freeVarSubAllTerms1 : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAllTerms n ts m)) -> exists a : nat, In a (freeVarTerms L n ts) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m a))
subTermsNil : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> substituteTerms L n ts v s = ts
subAllTerms_ext : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerms n ts m1 = subAllTerms n ts m2
subTermsTrans : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerms L n ts)) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerms L n ts v1 s
freeVarSubAllTerms2 : forall (a : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L a) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerms L a ts) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerms L a (subAllTerms a ts m))
subAllTerm = fix subAllTerm (t : fol.Term L) : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Term L := match t with | @fol.var _ x => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => m x | @fol.apply _ f ts => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => fol.apply L f (subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts m) end with subAllTerms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) {struct ts} : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return ((nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => fun _ : nat -> fol.Term L => Tnil L | @Tcons _ n' t ss => fun m : nat ->...-> fol.Term L Arguments subAllTerm _ _%function_scope
subTermsId : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat), substituteTerms L n ts v (fol.var L v) = ts
freeVarSubTerms3 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerms L n ts)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
subSubTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 (substituteTerm L s1 v2 s2)
subAllFormula = fix subAllFormula (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) {struct f} : fol.Formula L := match f with | @fol.equal _ t s => fol.equal L (subAllTerm t m) (subAllTerm s m) | @fol.atomic _ r ts => fol.atomic L r (subAllTerms (arity L (inl r)) ts m) | @fol.impH _ f0 g => fol.impH L (subAllFormula f0 m) (subAllFormula g m) | @fol.notH _ f0 => fol.notH L (subAllFormula f0 m) | @fol.forallH _ n f0 => let nv := newVar (freeVarFormula L f0 ++ freeVarMap (freeVarFormula L (fol.forallH L n f0)) m) in fol.forallH L nv (subAllFormula f0 (fun v : nat => if Nat.eq_dec v n then fol.var L nv...
subTermsExch : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 s1
freeVarSubTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
freeVarSubTerms4 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n ts)
freeVarMap1 : forall (l : list nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In n l -> In v (freeVarMap l m)
subTermFunction : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (fol.apply L f ts) v s = fol.apply L f (substituteTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts v s)
freeVarSubAllTerm2 : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerm L t) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm t m))
freeVarSubAllFormula2 : forall (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarFormula L f) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarFormula L (subAllFormula f m))
freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
subFormulaRelation : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L) (ts : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteFormula L (fol.atomic L r ts) v s = fol.atomic L r (substituteTerms L (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)
freeVarSubAllFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula L (subAllFormula f m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
subTermVar1 : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (fol.var L v) v s = s
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
subTermVar2 : forall (L : Language) (v x : nat) (s : fol.Term L), v <> x -> substituteTerm L (fol.var L x) v s = fol.var L x
subTermNil : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> substituteTerm L t v s = t
subTermTrans : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerm L t)) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerm L t v1 s
